casebody.data:
Rafael ABREU
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 24, 2017

Peter Tsimbidaros, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Rafael Abreu's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 567, 160 A.3d 1077 (2017), is denied.
